Works awesome! Thanks, download in 20 min, im sedding also, oh and to go into a little more depth of instructions


1: Install
2: Go into the crack folder
3: Copy and paste the folder inside it and the Ricochet Infinity file into the directory (overwrite the old ones) 


There you have it. 

THANKS ALOT!
